item.title: Viirak add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Viirak add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Viirak add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Viirak add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Viirak add a quote by Maurice Switzer
item.description: "It is better to remain silent at the risk of being thought a fool, than to talk and remove all doubt of it." -- Maurice Switzer

item.title: Viirak add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Remember, if the time should come when you have to make a choice between what is right and what is easy, remember what happened to a boy who was good, and kind, and brave, because he strayed across the path of Lord Voldemort. Remember Cedric Diggory." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Viirak add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Today you are You, that is truer than true. There is no one alive who is Youer than You." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Viirak add a quote by Confucious
item.description: "Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life." -- Confucious

item.title: Viirak add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "If you can make a woman laugh, you can make her do anything." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Viirak add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Viirak add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Viirak add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Knowing others is intelligence; knowing yourself is true wisdom. Mastering others is strength; mastering yourself is true power. If you realize that you have enough, you are truly rich." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Viirak add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "A good traveler has no fixed plans and is not intent on arriving." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Viirak add a quote by Lao Tsu
item.description: "Those who know do not speak. Those who speak do not know." -- Lao Tsu

item.title: Viirak add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "The truth is not always beautiful, nor beautiful words the truth." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Viirak add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Time is a created thing. To say 'I don't have time,' is like saying, 'I don't want to." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Viirak add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Care about what other people think and you will always be their prisoner." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Viirak add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Silence is a source of Great Strength." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Viirak add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "To lead people, walk beside them ... As for the best leaders, the people do not notice their existence. The next best, the people honor and praise. The next, the people fear; and the next, the people hate ... When the best leader's work is done the people say, We did it ourselves!" -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Viirak add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "If you do not change direction, you may end up where you are heading." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Viirak add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Act without expectation." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Viirak add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "I have just three things to teach: simplicity, patience, compassion. These three are your greatest treasures." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Viirak add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Knowledge is a treasure, but practice is the key to it." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Viirak add a quote by Laozi
item.description: "If you correct your mind, the rest of your life will fall into place." -- Laozi

item.title: Viirak add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "True words are not fancy. Fancy words are not true. The good do not debate. Debaters are not good." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Viirak add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Spring comes, and the grass grows by itself." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Viirak add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "An over sharpened sword cannot last long. " -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Viirak add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "If you want to lead them you must place yourself behind them." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Viirak add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Nature does not hurry, yet everything is accomplished." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Viirak add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Doing nothing is better than being busy doing nothing." -- Lao Tzu
